CreateConfig.title: CreateConfig
CreateConfig.summary: Modifies the configurations of a common configuration item for alerts.

CreateDataLimit.title: CreateDataLimit
CreateDataLimit.summary: Authorizes Data Security Center (DSC) to scan data assets. The data assets can be a database, a project, or a bucket.

CreateRule.title: CreateRule
CreateRule.summary: Creates a custom sensitive data detection rule.

CreateScanTask.title: CreateScanTask
CreateScanTask.summary: Creates a custom scan task. The custom scan task is used to scan data assets on which Data Security Center (DSC) is granted the scan permissions for sensitive data.

CreateSlrRole.title: CreateSlrRole
CreateSlrRole.summary: Creates a service-linked role for Data Security Center (DSC) to grant DSC the permissions to access data assets in other services.

DeleteDataLimit.title: DeleteDataLimit
DeleteDataLimit.summary: Revokes the scan permissions on a data asset. The data asset can be a database, an instance, or a bucket.

DeleteRule.title: DeleteRule
DeleteRule.summary: Deletes a custom sensitive data detection rule from Data Security Center (DSC).

DescribeCategoryTemplateList.title: Query Industry Template List
DescribeCategoryTemplateList.summary: Call this interface to query the list of industry templates.

DescribeCategoryTemplateRuleList.title: DescribeCategoryTemplateRuleList
DescribeCategoryTemplateRuleList.summary: Queries rules in a classification template by page.

DescribeColumns.title: DescribeColumns
DescribeColumns.summary: Queries data in the columns of the tables that Data Security Center (DSC) is authorized to access. The tables include the tables of MaxCompute and ApsaraDB RDS.

DescribeColumnsV2.title: Query Data in Columns of Data Assets V2
DescribeColumnsV2.summary: Query data in columns of data assets such as MaxCompute, RDS, etc., that are authorized by the Data Security Center.

DescribeConfigs.title: DescribeConfigs
DescribeConfigs.summary: Queries common configuration items for alerts.

DescribeDataAssets.title: DescribeDataAssets
DescribeDataAssets.summary: Queries the sensitive data detection results of data assets that Data Security Center (DSC) is authorized to access.

DescribeDataLimitDetail.title: DescribeDataLimitDetail
DescribeDataLimitDetail.summary: Queries the details of a data asset, such as a MaxCompute project, an ApsaraDB RDS database, or an Object Storage Service (OSS) bucket, that you authorize Data Security Center (DSC) to access.

DescribeDataLimitSet.title: DescribeDataLimitSet
DescribeDataLimitSet.summary: Queries assets that Data Security Center (DSC) is authorized to scan, or the regions that DSC supports.

DescribeDataLimits.title: DescribeDataLimits
DescribeDataLimits.summary: Queries the data assets such as instances, databases, or buckets that Data Security Center (DSC) is authorized to access.

DescribeDataMaskingRunHistory.title: DescribeDataMaskingRunHistory
DescribeDataMaskingRunHistory.summary: Queries the execution information about a de-identification task.

DescribeDataObjectColumnDetailV2.title: Query Data Object Column Details V2
DescribeDataObjectColumnDetailV2.summary: View Data Object Column Details V2

DescribeDataObjects.title: Query Data Object List
DescribeDataObjects.summary: Paginated Query of Data Catalog Objects

DescribeDocTypes.title: DescribeDocTypes
DescribeDocTypes.summary: Queries a list of OSS object types that can be identified.

DescribeEventDetail.title: DescribeEventDetail
DescribeEventDetail.summary: Queries the details of an anomalous event. The details include the time when the anomalous event occurred, and the description and handling status of the anomalous event.

DescribeEventTypes.title: DescribeEventTypes
DescribeEventTypes.summary: Queries the types of anomalous events.

DescribeIdentifyTaskStatus.title: Get Identification Task Status
DescribeIdentifyTaskStatus.summary: Query the status of an identification task

DescribeInstanceSources.title: DescribeInstanceSources
DescribeInstanceSources.summary: Queries a list of data assets.

DescribeInstances.title: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.summary: Queries data assets such as MaxCompute, ApsaraDB RDS, and Object Storage Service (OSS) that you authorize Data Security Center (DSC) to access.

DescribeOssObjectDetail.title: DescribeOssObjectDetail
DescribeOssObjectDetail.summary: Queries the details of an Object Storage Service (OSS) object that Data Security Center (DSC) is authorized to access.

DescribeOssObjectDetailV2.title: DescribeOssObjectDetailV2
DescribeOssObjectDetailV2.summary: Call this interface to query the details of a single storage object in OSS that is authorized by the Data Security Center.

DescribeOssObjects.title: DescribeOssObjects
DescribeOssObjects.summary: Queries Object Storage Service (OSS) objects that you authorize Data Security Center (DSC) to access.

DescribePackages.title: DescribePackages
DescribePackages.summary: Queries information about the MaxCompute packages that Data Security Center (DSC) is authorized to access. The information includes the names of MaxCompute packages, the accounts of MaxCompute package owners, and the sensitivity levels of MaxCompute packages.

DescribeParentInstance.title: DescribeParentInstance
DescribeParentInstance.summary: Gets the list of first-level authorizations.

DescribeRiskLevels.title: DescribeRiskLevels
DescribeRiskLevels.summary: Queries the sensitivity levels that are defined in a rule template provided by Data Security Center (DSC).

DescribeTables.title: DescribeTables
DescribeTables.summary: Queries tables in data assets such as MaxCompute projects and ApsaraDB RDS instances that Data Security Center (DSC) is authorized to access.

DescribeTemplateAllRules.title: Query All Models List of Industry Templates
DescribeTemplateAllRules.summary: Call this interface to query all models list of industry templates.

DescribeUserStatus.title: DescribeUserStatus
DescribeUserStatus.summary: Queries the information about an account.

DisableUserConfig.title: DisableUserConfig
DisableUserConfig.summary: Disables a configuration item. After you disable a configuration item, you can call the CreateConfig operation to enable the configuration item by specifying the code of the configuration item for the Code parameter in the request.

ModifyDataLimit.title: ModifyDataLimit
ModifyDataLimit.summary: Modifies configuration items for a data asset that you authorize Data Security Center (DSC) to access.

ModifyDefaultLevel.title: ModifyDefaultLevel
ModifyDefaultLevel.summary: Changes the sensitivity levels of sensitive data. You can change the default sensitivity levels of data that cannot be classified as sensitive or insensitive, and the sensitivity levels of data that can be classified as sensitive.

ModifyEventTypeStatus.title: ModifyEventTypeStatus
ModifyEventTypeStatus.summary: Enables the detection of anomalous events of subtypes.

ModifyReportTaskStatus.title: ModifyReportTaskStatus
ModifyReportTaskStatus.summary: Enables or disables the report task.

ModifyRule.title: ModifyRule
ModifyRule.summary: Modifies a custom sensitive data detection rule in Data Security Center (DSC).

ModifyRuleStatus.title: ModifyRuleStatus
ModifyRuleStatus.summary: Enables or disables a sensitive data detection rule.

ScanOssObjectV1.title: ScanOssObjectV1
ScanOssObjectV1.summary: Creates an identification task to scan sensitive data in Object Storage Service (OSS) objects.

StopMaskingProcess.title: StopMaskingProcess
StopMaskingProcess.summary: Stops a de-identification task. After you stop a de-identification task, you can resume the task by calling the ManualTriggerMaskingProcess operation.
